definition: suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: Sometimes they gather inside the limbic system of the brain and in certain corners of the heart.
sentences.chinese: 有時它們聚集在大腦的邊緣系統和心臟的某些角落。

sentences.english: Nucleus habenula is the axis of the descending pathway from limbic system to the brain stem.
sentences.chinese: 繮核是前腦邊緣系統向腦幹下行投射的樞紐。

sentences.english: The implicit memory is coded into the limbic system, and the resonance gets activated.
sentences.chinese: 內隱記憶的編碼存於邊緣系統內，共振纔得到激活。

sentences.english: Their cerebellum seems to be smaller than normal, and their limbic system is impaired.
sentences.chinese: 他們的小腦似乎小於正常，他們的邊緣系統受損。
